com.mapbox.services.android.telemetry.permissions

Class PermissionsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.telemetry.permissions.PermissionsManager

  • public class PermissionsManager
extends Object
    Helps request permissions at runtime.

      • onRequestPermissionsResult

        public void onRequestPermissionsResult(int requestCode,
                                       String[] permissions,
                                       int[] grantResults)
        You should call this method from your activity onRequestPermissionsResult.
        Parameters:
        requestCode - The request code passed in requestPermissions(android.app.Activity, String[], int)
        permissions - The requested permissions. Never null.
        grantResults - The grant results for the corresponding permissions which is either PERMISSION_GRANTED or PERMISSION_DENIED. Never null.
